name: Sometimes (Ludipe)
description:
A little puzzle game with some bits of narrative I felt like writing. Drag pieces to the board using your mouse and sort out your feelings (fear, happiness, sadness, etc).

Developed on a Saturday using some loose ideas I had while falling asleep the night before.

The game will allow you to skip any levels if you get stuck (that's intended).

The source file is quite messy as I prototyped this in just a few hours.
